snippet.title: PERSEVERA Teaser for Demo - Available in October 2023
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2567070/PERSEVERA/

Demo & Kickstarter Campaign release follows soon.


ABOUT
Persevera is a modern day psychological thriller of the terrifying nexus between a fanatic scientist with an unhinged notion of motherly love. You must come to grips with this involuntary purpose of life, in other words: the ever repeating agony meticulously composed just for you, in the remnants of a former research laboratory of the A.K.H. LUT, the “Artificial Kryogenic Hydroculture LUT University, Finland''.

The international operation consisted of spreading freezing agents in our oceans in order to stop the continuous rise of the earth’s temperature. This method might be trivial, but effective. At least for the first decade. Then, first mutations of sea dwellers were recorded and first human infections only shortly afterwards. The infections induced a catastrophic overburdening of the hospitals, which resulted in the highest global mass mortality rate ever recorded. 

The main story is driven by two main goals. First, opening the briefcase and secondly, finding out why you woke up wearing a torn medical scrub while being chained to the suitcase in the first place. While you are trying to figure out a way to open the briefcase, you simultaneously explore puzzling circumstances and find out more about the dangers.
